home.topBlockTitle: Invest with Purpose, Invest for the Future
home.topBlockText: Make a positive impact and achieve long-term financial success by investing in sustainable and socially responsible companies throughout Europe.
home.secondBlockText: At Baltvesta, we are passionate about driving growth and profitability for our portfolio companies, and delivering exceptional returns for our investors. Since 2001, we have been investing in high-potential companies throughout Europe, and actively participating in their development to unlock their full potential.

seccondBlockCols.title: Industry Expertise
seccondBlockCols.text: Deep industry expertise with a current focus in metal processing and real estate, allowing identification of high-potential companies and maximizing their potential.

seccondBlockCols.title: Strategic Partnership
seccondBlockCols.text: Collaborative approach to investing, working closely with portfolio companies executives to provide strategic guidance and operational support.

seccondBlockCols.title: Exceptional Returns
seccondBlockCols.text: Dedicated to delivering exceptional returns with integrity, transparency, and a long-term investment approach.

home.thirdBlockTitle:
Building the Future Through
Strategic Investments: Our
Areas of Expertise

thirdBlockCards.cardTitle: Investing in the Future of Metal Processing
thirdBlockCards.cardText: We believe in the importance of technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal processing industry. Our investments aim to support companies that share these values and strive to achieve excellence in their field.
thirdBlockCards.operatingBusiness: Umega Group, an international group of companies dedicated to technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal industry.

thirdBlockCards.cardTitle: Shaping and Upholding a Real Estate Future Rooted in Sustainable Principles
thirdBlockCards.cardText: Our investments in commercial real estate aim to promote sustainable and innovative approaches to construction and urban development. Our unwavering commitment involves generating sustained value for our investors and fostering the betterment of local communities.
thirdBlockCards.operatingBusiness: We own 2 commercial properties and we are currently running two commercial real estate development projects to expand our portfolio and maximize returns.

fourthBlockCols.title: Pharmacy
fourthBlockCols.text: Investing in life-saving drugs and therapies through innovative pharmaceutical companies.

fourthBlockCols.title: Real estate
fourthBlockCols.text: Investing in sustainable and profitable commercial real estate properties for stable returns.

fourthBlockCols.title: Financial services
fourthBlockCols.text: Investing in innovative and responsible financial services companies for evolving customer needs.

about.topBlockTitle: Our Passion for Growth and Development
about.topBlockDescription:
At Baltvesta, we are driven by a passion to achieve long-term growth and
development through strategic investments and partnerships.
about.secondBlockText: Our story began with a passion for investing and a commitment to creating value for our stakeholders. Founded in Lithuania, we have since expanded our reach to other European countries, bringing our expertise and experience to diverse markets. Our success is rooted in our disciplined investment approach, which emphasizes long-term value creation and careful risk management.
about.thirdBlockTitle: From Our Roots to the Present: Our Journey in Investing

thirdBlockCols.title: Baltvesta founded
thirdBlockCols.text: The company was established with a vision of identifying exceptional investment opportunities; first investment made

thirdBlockCols.title: First metal processing investment
thirdBlockCols.text: Baltvesta took a step forward by investing in Utenos Elektrortechnika, a company specializing in metal processing. This pivotal move laid the groundwork for its current investment focus.

thirdBlockCols.title: Expansion into new markets
thirdBlockCols.text: With a growing reputation for success, Baltvesta expanded its investments beyond Lithuania and into other European countries

thirdBlockCols.title: Launch of Umega
thirdBlockCols.text: Baltvesta launched its own metal processing company, Umega, to further solidify its position in the industry

about.fourthBlockTitle: Disciplined investment approach that is rooted in our core principles of integrity, transparency, and long-term value creation.

fourthBlockCols.title: Disciplined Approach
fourthBlockCols.text: Our disciplined approach focuses on long-term value creation by investing in fundamentally sound businesses and partnering with portfolio companies to drive growth and profitability.

fourthBlockCols.title: Sector Expertise
fourthBlockCols.text: With a deep understanding of the metal processing and real estate industries, we leverage our sector expertise to identify attractive investment opportunities and create value through active participation in portfolio companies.

fourthBlockCols.title: Risk Management
fourthBlockCols.text: Our approach to risk management is founded on a rigorous due diligence process, appropriate financial structuring, and active monitoring of investments to identify and mitigate potential risks.

fourthBlockCols.title: Focus on Sustainability
fourthBlockCols.text: We believe that sustainable investments are key to long-term value creation, and as such, we prioritize investments in companies that demonstrate a commitment to environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles.

fifthBlocCards.cardText: We believe in the importance of technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal processing industry. Our investments aim to support companies that share these values and strive to achieve excellence in their field.

fifthBlocCards.cardTitle: Building a Sustainable Future for Real Estate
fifthBlocCards.cardText: Our investments in commercial real estate aim to promote sustainable and innovative approaches to construction and urban development. We are committed to creating long-term value for our investors, while contributing to the well-being of local communities. Our investments in commercial real estate aim to promote sustainable and innovative approaches to construction and urban development. We are committed to creating long-term value for our investors, while contributing to the well-being of local communities.

sixthBlockTabsContent.title: Investing in the Future of Metal Processing
sixthBlockTabsContent.text:
International group of companies dedicated to technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal industry.

With roots reaching as far back as 1919, the group are full scope specialists in industrial metal: from carring out R&D to providing processing services and building a range of proprietary products for industrial and agricultural customers.

cols.text: unique production facilities in Lithuania and Germany

sixthBlockTabsContent.title: Shaping and Upholding a Real Estate Future Rooted in Sustainable Principles
sixthBlockTabsContent.text: In development. Unique office space in the Central Business District of Vilnius with the highest standards for sustainability and focus on staff wellbeeing, creative and inspiring environment.
